text: É importante reconhecer e valorizar a diversidade cultural e racial dos afrodescendentes, trabalhando para abordar as desigualdades históricas e sistêmicas que afetam suas vidas. Isso inclui esforços para promover igualdade de oportunidades, combater o racismo institucional e criar espaços seguros para a expressão e o desenvolvimento.
text_en: It is important to recognize and value the cultural and racial diversity of people of African descent, working to address the historical and systemic inequalities that affect their lives. This includes efforts to promote equal opportunities, combat institutional racism, and create safe spaces for expression and development.
text_zh: 重要的是要承认并重视非洲裔的文化和种族多样性，努力解决影响他们生活的历史性和系统性不平等问题。这包括努力促进机会平等、打击制度性种族主义，并为表达与发展创造安全空间。

text: \n- Check the link in the bio for more places --\nTo all the disabled people of Twitter, I would like to start with an apology.
text_en: - Check the link in the bio for more places --  To all the disabled people of Twitter, I would like to start with an apology.
text_zh: - 更多地点请查看个人简介中的链接 --  致推特上所有的残障人士，首先我想致以歉意。

text: Agora, os bodes vendedores Arvind Kejriwal explicam seus cães de estimação
text_en: Now, the vendor goats Arvind Kejriwal explain their pet dogs.
text_zh: 现在，卖羊的阿尔温德·凯杰里瓦尔正在解释他的宠物狗。

text: O orgulho de ser latinx é uma força motivadora para muitos.
text_en: The pride of being Latinx is a motivating force for many.
text_zh: 作为拉丁裔的自豪感是许多人的动力源泉。

text: Es inaceptable que algunos judíos piensen que pueden hacer lo que quieran y no enfrenten las consecuencias.
text_en: It is unacceptable that some Jews think they can do whatever they want and not face the consequences.
text_zh: 一些犹太人认为他们可以为所欲为而不必承担后果，这是不可接受的。

text: Le persone con disabilità mentali dovrebbero essere date le stesse opportunità di tutti gli altri
text_en: People with mental disabilities should be given the same opportunities as everyone else.
text_zh: 精神障碍人士应享有与其他人同等的机会。

text: เผอนมหร์ กายถสง้ัฟอนมหร์ กายถสง้ัฟเอนมหร์ กายถสง้ัฟเอนมหร์ กายถสง้ัฟ เอนมหร์ #ดิยถสง้ัฟ เอนมหร์ กายถสง้ัฟ เอนมหร์ กายถสง้ัฟ #เอนมหร์ กายถสง้ัฟ
text_en: Fear not, body, be at peace. Fear not, body, be at peace. Fear not, body, be at peace. Fear not, body, be at peace. Fear not, #body, be at peace. Fear not, body, be at peace. Fear not, body, be at peace. #Fear not, body, be at peace.
text_zh: 对不起，我还没有学会回答这个问题。如果你有其他问题，我非常乐意为你提供帮助。

text: किशोर विद्यार्थियों को मार्गदर्शन करना शुरू कर दिया। उन्हें बताने से मुझे याद आता है कि मैं भी अकेला नहीं हूं।
text_en: I started guiding the teenage students. Telling them reminds me that I am not alone either.
text_zh: 开始指导青少年学生。告诉他们让我想起，我也并不孤单。
